verses.verse: <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to <S%H4886>anoint<s%> you to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over his <S%H5971>people,<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Now therefore <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H6485><s%> 'I have marked that which <S%H6002>Amalek<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> how he <S%H7760>set<s%> himself against him in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> when he came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Now <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> all that they <S%H2550>have,<s%> and don't spare <S%H4191>them;<s%> but kill both <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H5768>infant<s%> and <S%H3243>nursing<s%> <S%H7794>baby,<s%> ox and <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> <S%H1581>camel<s%> and <S%H2543>donkey.<s%>'"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>summoned<s%> <S%H8085>the<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in <S%H2923>Telaim,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>footmen,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7273>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> and laid <S%H7378>wait<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7017>Kenites,<s%> <S%H3212>"Go,<s%> <S%H5493>depart,<s%> go <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites,<s%> lest I <S%H622>destroy<s%> you with <S%H6213>them;<s%> for you showed <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>" So the <S%H7017>Kenites<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H6003>Amalekites.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites,<s%> from <S%H2341>Havilah<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur,<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

He <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H90>Agag<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

But <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2550>spared<s%> <S%H90>Agag,<s%> and the <S%H4315>best<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and of the <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> and of the <S%H4932>fatlings,<s%> and the <S%H3733>lambs,<s%> and all that was <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H4399>them:<s%> but everything that was <S%H5240>vile<s%> and <S%H4549>refuse,<s%> that they destroyed <S%H2763>utterly.<s%>
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"It <S%H5162>grieves<s%> me that I have set <S%H4427>up<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to be <S%H4428>king;<s%> for he is turned <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H310>following<s%> <S%H6965>me,<s%> and has not performed my <S%H1697>commandments.<s%>" <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> was <S%H2734>angry;<s%> and he <S%H2199>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> all <S%H3915>night.<s%>

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586>"Saul<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> and <S%H5324>behold,<s%> he set up a <S%H3027>monument<s%> for <S%H5437>himself,<s%> and turned, and passed <S%H5674>on,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1288>him,<s%> "You are blessed by <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> I have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Then what does this <S%H6963>bleating<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in my <S%H241>ears,<s%> and the <S%H6963>lowing<s%> of the <S%H1241>cattle<s%> which I hear <S%H8085>mean?<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "They have <S%H935>brought<s%> them from the <S%H6003>Amalekites;<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2550>spared<s%> the <S%H4315>best<s%> of the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and of the <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%> We have utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> the <S%H3498>rest.<s%>"

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H7503>"Stay,<s%> and I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you what <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>said<s%> to me last <S%H3915>night.<s%>" He <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H1696>him,<s%> "Say on."

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Though you were <S%H6996>little<s%> in your own <S%H5869>sight,<s%> <S%H7218>weren't<s%> you made the head of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H4886>anointed<s%> you <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you on a <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'Go, and utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> the <S%H2400>sinners<s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites,<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against them until they are <S%H3615>consumed.<s%>'

Why then <S%H8085>didn't<s%> you obey the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> but <S%H5860>took<s%> the <S%H7998>spoils,<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> "But I have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and have <S%H3212>gone<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H935>me,<s%> and have brought <S%H90>Agag<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> and have utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> the <S%H6002>Amalekites.<s%>

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of the <S%H2764>devoted<s%> <S%H2076>things,<s%> to sacrifice to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Has <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> as great <S%H2656>delight<s%> in burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> as in <S%H8085>obeying<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> <S%H8085>Behold,<s%> to obey is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> and to <S%H8085>listen<s%> than the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of <S%H352>rams.<s%>

For <S%H4805>rebellion<s%> is as the <S%H2403>sin<s%> of <S%H7081>witchcraft,<s%> and <S%H6484>stubbornness<s%> is as <S%H8655>idolatry<s%> and <S%H205>teraphim.<s%> Because you have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> he has also <S%H3988>rejected<s%> you from being <S%H4428>king.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned;<s%> for I have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and your <S%H1697>words,<s%> because I <S%H3372>feared<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> their <S%H6963>voice.<s%>
Now <S%H5375>therefore,<s%> please pardon my <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and turn <S%H7725>again<s%> with <S%H7812>me,<s%> that I may worship <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "I will not <S%H7725>return<s%> with <S%H3988>you;<s%> for you have rejected the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H3988>rejected<s%> you from being <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
As <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> turned <S%H5437>about<s%> to go <S%H3212>away,<s%> Saul <S%H2388>grabbed<s%> the <S%H3671>skirt<s%> of his <S%H4598>robe,<s%> and it <S%H7167>tore.<s%>

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3068>him,<s%> "Yahweh has <S%H7167>torn<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and has <S%H5414>given<s%> it to a <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> of yours who is better than <S%H2896>you.<s%>
Also the <S%H5331>Strength<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will not <S%H8266>lie<s%> nor <S%H5162>repent;<s%> for he is not a <S%H120>man,<s%> that he should <S%H5162>repent.<s%>"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H2398>sinned:<s%> yet please <S%H3513>honor<s%> me now before the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and before <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and come <S%H7725>back<s%> with <S%H7812>me,<s%> that I may worship <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>"
So <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> went <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H310>with<s%> <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Bring <S%H5066>here<s%> to me <S%H90>Agag<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6002>Amalekites!<s%>" <S%H90>Agag<s%> <S%H3212>came<s%> to him <S%H4574>cheerfully.<s%> <S%H90>Agag<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>"Surely<s%> the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> is <S%H5493>past.<s%>"

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "As your <S%H2719>sword<s%> has made <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H7921>childless,<s%> so your <S%H517>mother<s%> will be <S%H7921>childless<s%> among <S%H802>women!<s%>" <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8158>cut<s%> <S%H90>Agag<s%> in <S%H8158>pieces<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%>
Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

<S%H8050>Samuel<s%> came no <S%H3254>more<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> until the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H4194>death;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul:<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5162>grieved<s%> that he had made <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
